name: MMM-Webuntis (MagicMirror Dev)
postStartCommand: mkdir -p /tmp/playwright-mcp-output && if [ "${ENABLE_PLAYWRIGHT_MCP:-1}" = "1" ]; then nohup npx @playwright/mcp@latest --isolated --no-sandbox --viewport-size=1920x1080 --port=8931 --output-dir=/tmp/playwright-mcp-output > /tmp/playwright-mcp.log 2>&1 & echo "Playwright MCP started (logs: /tmp/playwright-mcp.log, port: 8931)"; else echo 'Playwright MCP disabled via ENABLE_PLAYWRIGHT_MCP'; fi; echo 'Devcontainer started. MagicMirror at http://localhost:8080'
